title: A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of that part of Josephus's history, which gives an account of Iaddus the high-priest's submitting to Alexander the Great while Darius was living against the answer to the piece intituled, Obedience and submission to the present government.
author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
notes: Half title: A letter to Dr. Sherlock, in vindication of his late book, entituled The case of allegiance.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Duke University Library.
